import React,{useState} from 'react'; import NavBar from './NavBar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import ProfileSidebar from './ProfileSidebar'; const Profile = () =>{ const defaultForm = {fName:'',lName:'',email:''}; const[formData,setFormData] = useState(defaultForm); return ( <>

Your Profile

{setFormData({...formData,fName:e.target.value})}} placeholder="First Name" value="" className="form-control here" type="text"/>
{setFormData({...formData,lName:e.target.value})}} placeholder="Last Name" value={formData} className="form-control here" type="text"/>
{setFormData({...formData,email:e.target.value})}} placeholder="Email" className="form-control here" value={formData.email} required="required" type="text"/>
) } export default Profile;
